home_page.subtitle: Start your payment and rewards experience here, pay anywhere.
home_page.question: What if everything you need was on your phone?
home_page.meaning: Plata is a complete digital wallet that allows you to manage your payments, tickets, insurance, and personal documents from your phone quickly, securely, and hassle-free. Everything in one place, always within reach.
home_page.service_body1: Add and store favorite service accounts, making recurring payments easier.
home_page.service_body2: Link credit, debit cards, bank accounts, or cryptocurrencies.
home_page.service_body3: Store documents like IDs, invoices, contracts, receipts, insurance policies, and more.
home_page.service_body4: Provides support via live chat, email, phone line, and in-app forms.
home_page.steps_title: Your Digital Wallet in Just 3 Steps!
home_page.step_body1: Search for Plata on Google Play or App Store and download it for free in seconds.
home_page.step_body2: Register by entering your information. It's quick and you'll be ready in just minutes.
home_page.step_body3: You're all set! Start using Plata to make payments, store documents, and more from your phone.
home_page.aly_body1: Make instant payments quickly and securely from your phone.
home_page.aly_title2: Store Your Tickets and Digital Receipts
home_page.aly_body2: Forget paper: keep all your tickets and receipts in one place, always accessible.
home_page.aly_title3: Connect Your Student or Work ID
home_page.aly_body3: Easily link your credentials and always have them at hand to access, identify, or verify.
home_page.accepted_body1: Plata has national agreements that allow it to be used as a payment method across a wide network of companies. Join the community and enjoy all the benefits.
home_page.accepted_body2: Connect your business to the Plata network and offer your customers a safe, modern, and accessible payment method. Help drive the digital economy in your community.
home_page.review_title: Already used PLATA? We'd love to hear from you!
home_page.review_body: Tell us about your experience with the app. Your feedback helps us improve and continue building a platform tailored to you.
home_page.download_title: Download the App and Start Using PLATA Today
home_page.download_body: Tell us about your experience with the app. Your feedback helps us improve and continue building a platform tailored to you.
home_page.contact_body: Visit our contact page and we'll gladly answer your questions.
home_page.faq_body: Have questions about how Plata works? Here are the most common questions to help you get the most out of our app.

questions.answer1: Plata is a digital wallet that allows you to make payments, store documents, manage credentials, and much more — all from your phone.
questions.question2: Where can I download the app?
questions.answer2: Plata is available on Google Play and the App Store. Just search for 'Plata' and download it for free.
questions.question3: What type of documents can I store in the app?
questions.answer3: You can store IDs, contracts, insurance policies, invoices, tickets, and other important documents.
questions.answer4: Yes. Plata uses advanced security technology to protect your information and transactions.
questions.question5: What payment methods does Plata accept?
questions.answer5: You can link credit cards, debit cards, bank accounts, or even cryptocurrencies.
questions.question6: Where can I use Plata as a payment method?
questions.answer6: Plata is accepted at large companies, stores, businesses, and ventures affiliated with our national network.
questions.question7: What if I have problems with the app?
questions.answer7: If you need help, you can easily contact us through our contact page. We're here to help!

about.title: About Us
about.body: At Plata, we believe in a future where technology simplifies people's financial lives. We are a company focused on developing secure, accessible, and efficient digital solutions. Our main tool is the Plata app, a digital wallet that lets you make payments, store important documents, and manage credentials from your phone. We created Plata with the goal of offering a modern, practical, and reliable experience designed to support you daily, wherever you are.
about.mission_body: To simplify people's financial lives through simple, secure, and accessible digital solutions focused on innovation and user experience.
about.vision_body: To be the leading digital wallet in Latin America, driving the digital transformation of payments and personal document management.

vision.vision1: Innovation: We constantly seek to improve and offer modern solutions.
vision.vision2: Security: We protect our users' information and transactions.
vision.vision3: Accessibility: We create tools that are easy to use and available to everyone.
vision.vision4: Trust: We build long-term relationships with our users through transparency and great service.

about.memebrs_body: Behind Plata is a team committed to innovation, technology, and service. We work together to create a secure, practical digital experience designed for you.
